mapper.sql: SELECT i.image_id, COALESCE(metadata->>'import-path', i.filename) AS filename, i.taken, i.modified, i.entered, i.summary, i.description, i.credit, ST_AsGeoJSON(i.geog::GEOMETRY) AS geojson, geog_accuracy, ispublic, i.metadata::text
mapper.select: FROM image AS i WHERE i.image_id = #{id}

FROM image AS i WHERE 1=1
AND i.description IS NULL
AND i.description IS NOT NULL
AND i.geog IS NULL
AND i.geog IS NOT NULL
AND search @@ plainto_tsquery('simple', #{search})
AND ST_intersects( i.geog, ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(#{aoi}), 4326) )
AND ispublic
ORDER BY i.image_id ASC OFFSET ${offset} LIMIT ${limit}
SELECT credit, taken, summary, description, geojson, accuracy, tags, ispublic FROM images_common(${item})
mapper.update: UPDATE image SET taken = #{taken}, credit = #{credit}, summary = #{summary}, description = #{description}, geog = ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(#{geojson}), 4326)::GEOGRAPHY, geog_accuracy = #{accuracy}, ispublic = #{ispublic} WHERE image_id = #{id}
